successes.title: Equiso Smart TV
successes.description: Turn any TV into a Smart TV. Android 4.0. Control it with the wave of a hand, using our revolutionary gesture remote.

Pledges.description: THANK YOU for your support! As an appreciation, you get exclusive updates, software betas, a shout out on Facebook and your name on our support page.
EARLY BIRDS Help us get started! One Equiso Smart TV with wireless gesture remote. Free shipping to USA. (Add $15 for international shipping.)
One Equiso Smart TV with wireless gesture remote. Free shipping to USA. (Add $15 for international shipping.)
One Equiso Smart TV with wireless gesture remote. Free shipping to USA. (Add $15 for international shipping.)
EQUISO SMART TV PRO - Stretched Goals with wireless gesture remote. Includes first four stretched goals. Free shipping to USA. (Add $15 for international shipping.)
HOUSE PACK Enjoy a Smart TV in the living room and any other room you choose. Get two Equiso Smart TV's and two wireless gesture remotes. Free shipping to USA. (Add $15 for international shipping.)
HOUSE PACK Enjoy a Smart TV in the living room and any other room you choose. Get two Equiso Smart TV's and two wireless gesture remotes. Free shipping to USA. (Add $15 for international shipping.)
FRIEND PACK Get Four Equiso Smart TV's and four wireless gesture remotes for you and your three closest friends. Free shipping to USA. (Add $15 for international shipping.)
